Meijer Premoistened Wipes, Fragrance Free

Brand: Meijer

Category: Makeup Remover

Ingredients: WATER, CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE, DECYL GLUCOSIDE, PEG-7 GLYCERYL COCOATE, GLYCERIN, BUTYLENE GLYCOL, PHENOXYETHANOL, PEG-400, POLYHEXAMETHYLENE BIGUANIDE HYDROCHLORIDE, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, ALOE BARBADENSIS LEAF EXTRACT, IODOPROPYNYL BUTYLCARBAMATE
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
